acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

fundXVSVault(uint256).custom:error: InsufficientBalance is thrown when amount entered is greater than balance

params.amountMantissa: Amount to be sent to XVS vault

initialize(address,address).custom:error: ZeroAddressNotAllowed is thrown when XVS vault address is zero

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAccessControlManager(address).details: Admin function to set address of AccessControlManager

params.accessControlManager_: The new address of the AccessControlManager

setXVSVault(address).custom:error: ZeroAddressNotAllowed is thrown when XVS vault address is zero

sweepToken(address,address,uint256).custom:error: ZeroAddressNotAllowed is thrown when tokenAddress/to address is zeroZeroValueNotAllowed is thrown when amount is zero

params.amount: Amount need to sweep for the contract
params.to: Address to which assets will be transferred

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

InsufficientBalance().notice: Thrown when given input amount is zero

Unauthorized(address,address,string).notice: Thrown when the action is prohibited by AccessControlManager

ZeroAddressNotAllowed().notice: Thrown if the supplied address is a zero address where it is not allowed

ZeroValueNotAllowed().notice: Thrown if the supplied value is 0 where it is not allowed

FundsTransferredToXVSStore(address,uint2.notice: Emitted when funds transferred to XVSStore address

NewAccessControlManager(address,address).notice: Emitted when access control manager contract address is changed

SweepToken(address,address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when tokens are swept

XVSVaultUpdated(address,address).notice: Emitted when XVS vault address is updated

accessControlManager().notice: Returns the address of the access control manager contract

fundXVSVault(uint256).notice: This function transfers funds to the XVS vault

sweepToken(address,address,uint256).notice: Function to sweep tokens from the contract

userdoc.notice: XVSVaultTreasury stores the tokens sent by SingleTokenConverter(XVS) and funds XVSVault
